misdeed: The inhabitants of a remote village are plagued by vivid nightmares and strange illnesses. Their livestock are born deformed, and crops fail. A pervasive sense of dread hangs over the community.
solution: The Vaesen are Fairies and can be driven away by finding their magical paths and walking them while ringing a church bell and sprinkling holy water.

clues.description: Villagers report seeing flickering lights and hearing ethereal music coming from the nearby woods at night.
Children speak of tiny, winged creatures that whisper in their ears while they sleep, telling them secrets and lies.
Milk curdles overnight, and food spoils at an alarming rate, as if tainted by an unseen force.
Local legends speak of a hidden glade deep within the forest where fairies dance under the moonlight.
A strange, sweet-smelling dust is found sprinkled on the doorsteps of the afflicted villagers.
Mushrooms grow in a perfect circle in the village center, their caps glowing with a faint, eerie light.

plotTwist.description: A young boy, ostracized by the village children, has befriended the Vaesen and is unknowingly aiding them in their mischief.
